content.question: The graph most strongly indicates which of the following about the likelihood of those accused of witchcraft being executed in the period 1550 to 1700 ?

choices.label: The likelihood of those accused of witchcraft being executed remained approximately the same throughout the period.
The likelihood of those accused of witchcraft being executed increased significantly after 1600.
The likelihood of those accused of witchcraft being executed was higher in periods where the number of accusations was increasing.
The likelihood of those accused of witchcraft being executed was significantly lower after the end of the Thirty Yearsâ€™ War.

content.answer: The likelihood of those accused of witchcraft being executed remained approximately the same throughout the period.

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
